message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $175. This exceptional value includes not only the product itself but also a limited-time access to exclusive content and support services. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $125. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the exclusive content and support services you're offering. I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am unable to accept your offer of $125. However, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $145 for the product. This price still reflects the value of the product along with the exclusive content and support services. I hope this proposal meets within your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $135. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the exclusive content and support services. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and I'm glad we're able to continue the discussion. Considering the value of the product and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $140. This price still reflects the value while allowing us to reach a fair agreement. I hope this proposal works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I'm still not willing to go above $135, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $137.50. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the exclusive content and support services. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
